cells.data:
Thursday June29, 2017 6:31pm
After considerable trial and error, I have succeeded (more or less) in getting the portable burners to work using a springfield. Problem before was that you donâ€™t want to have two springfields on the screen at the same time. The interfere with each other. What I did is just move the one I had used on the initial burner, and turn it down some. After some code to keep the bot centered on the burner, everything seems to mostly work.
